'''19w02a''' is the thirteenth [[snapshot]] for [[Java Edition 1.14]], released on January 9, 2019.<ref>{{snap|19w02a|January 9, 2019}}</ref> It adds the campfire block, the {{cmd|teammsg}} command, functionality for the cartography table and lectern, new block interaction statistics and a loading animation when loading a world. This is the first snapshot released in 2019.

== Additions ==
=== Blocks ===
[[File:Campfire JE1 BE1.gif|width=32x32]] '''[[Campfire]]'''
* Decorative fireplace without fire spread.
** Does not burn items.
* Crafted with a piece of coal or charcoal, sticks and logs, stripped logs, wood or stripped wood.
* Cooks up to four food items, but 3 times slower than a [[furnace]] (30 seconds).
** Right-click with food item to place food on campfire.
** Food item pops off when cooked.
* Emits a new type of particle, a smoke signal that can be seen from a longer distance than normal particles.
** The particles can travel through blocks.
** Placing a [[hay bale]] below the campfire causes the smoke particles to stay longer and rise higher.
* Emits a light level of 9.
* Can be put out using a [[water bucket]].
** Extinguishing a campfire pops off any food item on it, but the items can then not be picked up.
** Can be re-lit with [[flint and steel]], but not other fire sources like fire charges.
* Repeatedly deals {{hp|1}} damage when walked on. 
** Sneaking on a campfire prevents damage.

=== Command format ===
'''{{cmd|teammsg <message>}}'''
* General syntax: {{cmd|teammsg <message>}} Sends <message> to all players on the team of the player who runs the command. Available to all players on a team.
* Alias: {{cmd|tm <message>}}.
* Clicking the team name opens a new {{cmd|teammsg}} command.

=== General ===
'''[[Particles]]'''
* Two new particle types: <code>campfire_cosy_smoke</code> and <code>campfire_signal_smoke</code>.

'''[[Recipes]]'''
* "campfire" type recipes for adding custom campfire recipes.

'''[[Statistics]]'''
* Added 4 new statistics:
** "Interactions with Blast Furnace"
** "Interactions with Campfire"
** "Interactions with Lectern"
** "Interactions with Smoker"

'''World generation'''
* Added a loading animation when loading a world.
** Visualizes the rendering of the spawn chunks.

== Changes ==
=== Blocks ===
'''[[Cartography table]]s'''
* Can now be crafted from planks and paper.
* UI visualizes the function of the recipes.
* Allows cloning, extending, and locking of maps.
** Locking can be done with a [[glass pane]] to prevent modifying them.

'''[[Lectern]]s'''
* Can now be crafted from slabs and bookshelves.
* Right-click empty lectern to place book.
* Right-click lectern with book to open.
** Multiple people can read the book without having the item.
** Current page is persistent and shared between all readers.
* Book can be removed from it.
* Emits [[redstone]] pulses when page is changed.
** [[Redstone comparator]]s can be used to get book reading progress.

=== Mobs ===
'''[[Witch]]es'''
* Now hostile again.
* Changed appearance back to normal.
